alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 5:53PM CDT until October 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... East central Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tombigbee State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Fulton, Tombigbee State Park, Mantachie, Clay, Skyline, Abney, Cardsville, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville, Indian Hills, Dorsey and Jacinto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
